page.title: 16LOCAL GOVERNMENT:F.COMPTON.
page.content: The local {POLICE STATION }is at Southam, & help & information can always be made available via telephone & then by radio.Police cars & vans make regular daily patrols thro'out the area,& spend much time in seeing that traffic flows freely,& helping as needed with accidents. The Police kleep in touch with Schools,& send officers to talk to the children and the local community.The{PARISH COUNCIL helps to run local affairs,and looks after village lighting, street cleaning, cutting of grass, and gives advice on planning applications & the use of highways. The {CHURCH COUNCIL } runs the affairs of the Church in the villages of Fenny Compton & Avon Dassett looking after the running & upkeep & repair of the Church. The {SCHOOL GOVERNORS}help with the general running of the School but not upkeep..
